name: Benoît Libert
content: Benoit Libert Benoît Libert homepageSenior CNRS Researcher (DR2) (on leave) Ecole Normale Supérieure de Lyon AriC Team, LIP laboratory 46 Allée d'Italie69364 Lyon Cedex 07France email: benoit.libert at ens-lyon.fr Phone: +33.426.23.39.32 Ph.D. in Cryptography (February 2006) at the UCL Crypto Group. Habilitation à diriger des recherches (May 2015) at ENS de Lyon. Previously F.N.R.S. post-doctoral researcher, scientific collaborator at the UCL Crypto Group and researcher at Technicolor Research & Innovation. Previously involved in the ERC project LattAC led by Damien Stehlé. Previously coordinator of the PALSE project "Towards practical enhanced asymmetric encryption schemes" (2014-2016). Involved in the ANR project ALAMBIC (2016-2020). Coordinator of the H2020 project PROMETHEUS (2018-2021). Supervision Current and past students and post-docs Thomas Peters (PhD student, UCL, 2010-2014; main supervisor was Olivier Pereira).
